description: Like a work of art, this 3bed, 2bath townhome is architecturally impressive. W/ soaring 17ft ceiling heights & white beams accenting beautiful cedar, this home feels like a true West Coast sanctuary. The unique open concept layout features kitchen & dining above, a large main-level living area w/a striking black feature fireplace & all beds below. Enjoy over 600sqft of outdoor space w/ multiple patios & balconies, including 2 off the primary & second bedrooms. The lower level offers spacious flex room ideal for office, rec room, playroom, or creative studio, plus approx. 350sqft of storage. TWO parking stalls incl. Through the rear gate, it's an easy 2 min walk to the SkyTrain station. Strata fees are very low, only $250. Calling all investors & homeowners! Open House Sat Dec 6th 2-4pm
